Articles.Content: when I accept a torrist contract it says "take a suborbital space flight but in the middle of the mission it says " so and so's travel litenery" and I don't know where that is.

The suborbital spaceflight is that tourist's travel itinerary.

You will see later that you sometimes get contracts for multiple tourists. In the contract each tourist will be listed separately, with up to 4 destinations for that tourist. The 4 destinations are that tourist's itinerary.

If you want a picture of a contract with some arrows and a description, I can do that.

BThe contract may ask for multiple destinations like

›Suborbital flight

›Orbit Kerbin

› Flyby Mun

Each of this one will be checked when you put the tourist in the matching situation  

› keman itinerary 

This one will be fulfilled only after you recovery the tourist after all the others parameters are done. 

 

BTW, May I suggest a Ship to bring up to 8 tourists to orbit and back with minimal effort? 

Edited April 8, 2017 by Spricigo
TMNT
